form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: United States of America Declaration of Intention, No. 102348

full_text: No. UNITED STATES OF AMERICA DECLARATION OF INTENTION 18 Invalid for all purposes seven years after the date hereof State of Illinois, SS. In the Superior Court of Cook County. County of Cook 3. Herner Hatt , aged 39 years, occupation Walchmake do declare on oath that my personal description is: Color white, complexion Dark , height 5 feet 5 inches, weight 155 pounds, color of hair. Bricer color of eyes burnee other visible distinctive marks home - 1 was born in Harraw Poland Russia on the 12 day of Dec anno Domini 1 881. I now reside at 1758 Washburne are , Chicago, III. (Give number and street.) Trieste, Austria I emigrated to the United States of America from on the vessel america ; my last the allen arrived operate than by Tessel, the character or name of transportation company should be given.) foreign residence (If was narsaw Russia am married; the of my wife is Rosa : at Russia name she was born and now resides at Poland Russia It is my bona fide intention to renounce forever all allegiance and fidelity to any foreign prince, potentate, state, or sovereignty, and particularly to The Republic of to Rugsia or any In desendant State of whom I am now a subject: New Tork Parrived at the port of , in the New York of State let of , on or about the 12 day , polygamist nor a believer in the practice of polvramy; and it is my intention in good faith anno Domini I 920 I am not an anarchist : I am not a to become a citizen of the United States of America and to permanently reside therein : So HELP ME GOD. Horman Hott (Original signature of declarant.) Subscribed and sworn to before me in the office of the Clerk of said Court at Chicago, III., this 14 day of Dec [SEAL] anno Domini 1912C SAMUEL E. ERIOKSON Clerk of the Deputy Superior Clink Court.
